incident.message: Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.
Use `SwitchCompat` from AppCompat or `MaterialSwitch` from Material library
Use `SwitchCompat` from AppCompat or `MaterialSwitch` from Material library
A newer version of androidx.core:core-ktx than 1.12.0 is available: 1.16.0
A newer version of androidx.appcompat:appcompat than 1.6.1 is available: 1.7.0
A newer version of androidx.constraintlayout:constraintlayout than 2.1.4 is available: 2.2.1
A newer version of com.google.android.material:material than 1.10.0 is available: 1.12.0
Buttons in button bars should be borderless; use `style="?android:attr/buttonBarButtonStyle"` (and `?android:attr/buttonBarStyle` on the parent)
